questions:
Name the Latin phrase for "your efficiency".
*istam virtutem*

Which English word corresponds to the Latin combination of words "moderationem animi"?
*serenity / the serenity / your serenity*

Who sees and hears of the efficiency of Quintus? Indicate the appropriate genitive attributes.
*clarissimae provinciae* and *omnium gentium ac nationum*
text:
Quid autem reperiri tam eximium aut tam expetendum potest quam istam virtutem, moderationem animi, temperantiam [...] in luce Asiae, in oculis clarissimae provinciae atque in auribus omnium gentium ac nationum esse positam?


But what can turn out to be greater and more desirable than that your efficiency, your serenity and your modesty [...] were spread out in the public of the province of Asia, before the eyes of the highly famous province and before the ears of all tribes and peoples?
